column1: #text=I rolled my cart out of my apartment and locked my front door .
#text=I dragged the empty cart down the stairs and pushed it down the block toward the supermarket .
#text=As I walked , I mentally rehearsed some of the items I intended to buy .
#text=I needed eggs , milk , bread , cookies , and bananas .
#text=Maybe I would get a few other things if they looked good .
#text=I arrived at the store and hooked my cart to the store 's larger metal shopping cart .
#text=I passed the section with the bread fist , and put it in my cart .
#text=I took a while looking at the ingredients for different packages of cookies and finally decided to get a box that looked fresh and delicious without too many preservatives .
#text=I put my chosen cookies into my cart and kept pushing .
#text=I reached the refrigerated section and found the milk .
#text=I added a carton to my cart , and also chose some yogurt .
#text=I looked at the eggs and checked them for cracks before adding them .
#text=Then I turned my cart toward the fruit and vegetable aisle .
#text=I added bananas and then my eye caught some avocados that were on sale , so I decided to buy two of them .
#text=I also got a few apples and a box of cherry tomatoes .
#text=I rolled my cart toward the cashier and got on line to pay .
#text=When it was my turn I paid in cash and then put my bagged items into my cart .
#text=Then I pushed my cart home and unloaded my items in my kitchen .
